name: @ssdavidai/joeapi
description: Manage construction project data across clients, contacts, proposals, estimates, schedules, tasks, and subcontractors. Streamline creating, updating, and retrieving records with paginated lists and validation. Maintain accountability with audit trails and safely archive records without losing history.

tools.name: list_clients
tools.title: List Clients
tools.description: Retrieve a paginated list of clients

tools.name: create_client
tools.title: Create Client
tools.description: Create a new client record

tools.name: list_contacts
tools.title: List Contacts
tools.description: Retrieve a list of contacts

tools.name: create_contact
tools.title: Create Contact
tools.description: Create a new contact

tools.name: list_proposals
tools.title: List Proposals
tools.description: Get a minimal list of proposals with optional project filtering. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each proposal. Use discover or search to find proposals and get full details.

tools.name: list_estimates
tools.title: List Estimates
tools.description: Get a minimal list of estimates with optional project filtering. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each estimate. Use get_estimates to retrieve full details for a specific project's estimates.

limit.description: Items per page (default: 3, max: 10 to prevent token overflow)

projectId.description: UUID of project to filter by (optional - if not provided, returns estimates from all projects)

tools.name: list_action_items
tools.title: List Action Items
tools.description: Get a minimal list of action items with optional project filtering. Returns only name (title), id, and projectId for each action item. Use get_action_item to retrieve full details for a specific action item.

limit.description: Items per page (default: 3, max: 10 to prevent token overflow)

projectId.description: UUID of project to filter by (optional - if not provided, returns action items from all projects)

tools.name: get_action_item
tools.title: Get Action Item
tools.description: Get full details for a specific action item by ID

actionItemId.description: The GUID of the action item to retrieve

tools.name: create_action_item
tools.title: Create Action Item
tools.description: Create a new Action Item. Can be Generic (ActionTypeId=3), Cost Change (ActionTypeId=1), or Schedule Change (ActionTypeId=2). For Cost/Schedule changes, you MUST include the corresponding nested object with all required fields.

NoOfDays.description: Number of days to adjust schedule

tools.name: add_action_item_comment
tools.title: Add Action Item Comment
tools.description: Add a comment to an action item

tools.name: assign_action_item_supervisor
tools.title: Assign Action Item Supervisor
tools.description: Assign a supervisor to an action item

tools.name: list_projects
tools.title: List Projects
tools.description: Get a minimal list of all projects. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each project. Use get_project to retrieve full details for a specific project.

tools.name: get_project
tools.title: Get Project
tools.description: Get full project details by project ID

projectId.description: The GUID of the project to retrieve

tools.name: get_schedule
tools.title: Get Schedule
tools.description: Get full schedule data for a specific project

projectId.description: The GUID of the project to retrieve schedule for

tools.name: list_schedules
tools.title: List Schedules
tools.description: Get a minimal list of schedules with optional project filtering. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each schedule.

limit.description: Optional limit on number of results to return

projectId.description: Optional project GUID to filter schedules by project

tools.name: get_estimates
tools.title: Get Estimates
tools.description: Get full estimate data for a specific project

projectId.description: The GUID of the project to retrieve estimates for

tools.name: discover
tools.title: Discover Projects
tools.description: Discover comprehensive project data by searching for a project and retrieving all related information including project details, financials (estimates, job balances, cost variance), schedules, and action items - all in one unified JSON response

query.description: Search query to find the project (searches in project name, description, status)

projectId.description: Optional: Direct project ID if already known (skips search step)

tools.name: get_financials
tools.title: Get Financials
tools.description: Get comprehensive financial data for a project including job balances and cost variance

projectId.description: The GUID of the project to retrieve financial data for

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.title: Get Transactions
tools.description: Get transaction list for a project with optional date range filtering

projectId.description: The GUID of the project to retrieve transactions for

tools.name: find_project
tools.title: Find Project
tools.description: Search for projects by name, client name, or other attributes. Returns matching projects with basic info.

tools.name: find_estimate
tools.title: Find Estimate
tools.description: Search for estimates and estimate categories. Can search across all estimates or within a specific project.

query.description: Search query to find estimates or categories

projectId.description: Optional project GUID to search within specific project for estimate categories

tools.name: find_schedule
tools.title: Find Schedule
tools.description: Search for schedules and construction tasks. Can search across all schedules or within a specific project.

query.description: Search query to find schedules or tasks

projectId.description: Optional project GUID to search within specific project for construction tasks

tools.name: find_proposal
tools.title: Find Proposal
tools.description: Search for proposals by proposal number, title, or description. Can optionally filter by project.

projectId.description: Optional project GUID to filter proposals by project

tools.name: find_action_items
tools.title: Find Action Items
tools.description: Search for action items by title or description. Can optionally filter by project.

query.description: Search query to find action items

projectId.description: Optional project GUID to filter action items by project

tools.name: search
tools.title: Search
tools.description: Generic search tool that can search across multiple entity types with optional filtering by project.

type.description: Entity type to search: project, estimate, schedule, proposal, estimateCategory, constructionTask, action-item

projectId.description: Optional project GUID to filter results by project
